title: NR.3-Typographic Process, Kalender [Calendar Pictures], from the School of Design, Basel
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: At upper left center in large black block leters, NR.3. Below, fourteen concepts for calerdar designs. Upper portion of poster divided into six squares. Each design uses an unconventional application of black and white and large and small fonts and numerals. Lower portion is divided into eight squares where each design is a complete month. At upper left a text block describing the projects described above and at upper left the educational agenda from the School of Design, Basel that was the basis for the poster series.
name: Poster
